articles.description: KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WATE) — Sheriff’s Office investigators said Friday they believe the four-vehicle fire that occurred late New Year’s Eve was started by fireworks. Firefighters responded to the incident just around midnight in a northeast Knox County neighbor…
articles.content:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WATE) — Sheriff’s Office investigators said Friday they believe the four-vehicle fire that occurred late New Year’s Eve was started by fireworks.
